Reviews.Title: polaroid z340
Reviews.Author: wafj
Reviews.Content: Pretty nice camera, not to big, takes great pictures, lots of fun feature.  Not much for instructions you have to play with it to figure everything out. Overall a great camera my wife likes it and you can share you photos right away with the print option.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 3 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
